properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.access-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Access Key

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.bridge-error-handler
properties.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions (if possible) occurred while the Camel consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. Important: This is only possible if the 3rd party component allows Camel to be alerted if an exception was thrown. Some components handle this internally only, and therefore bridgeErrorHandler is not possible. In other situations we may improve the Camel component to hook into the 3rd party component and make this possible for future releases. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.configuration
properties.description: The component configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.aws2.s3vectors.AWS2S3VectorsConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.consumer-metadata-filter
properties.description: Optional metadata filter for the consumer to filter vectors during polling

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.consumer-query-vector
properties.description: The query vector to use for the consumer to poll for similar vectors. Specified as comma-separated float values (e.g., 0.1,0.2,0.3). If not specified, the consumer will not poll.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.data-type
properties.description: The data type of the vector. Options: float32, float16

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.delay
properties.description: Milliseconds before the next poll for the consumer

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.delete-after-read
properties.description: Delete vectors after they have been consumed

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.distance-metric
properties.description: The distance metric to use for similarity search. Options: cosine, euclidean, dot-product

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the aws2-s3-vectors component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.health-check-consumer-enabled
properties.description: Used for enabling or disabling all consumer based health checks from this component

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.health-check-producer-enabled
properties.description: Used for enabling or disabling all producer based health checks from this component. Notice: Camel has by default disabled all producer based health-checks. You can turn on producer checks globally by setting camel.health.producersEnabled=true.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.max-messages-per-poll
properties.description: The maximum number of messages to consume per poll for the consumer

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.operation
properties.description: The operation to perform

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.override-endpoint
properties.description: Set the need for overriding the endpoint. This option needs to be used in combination with uriEndpointOverride option

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.profile-credentials-name
properties.description: If using a profile credentials provider, this parameter will set the profile name

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.proxy-host
properties.description: To define a proxy host when instantiating the S3 Vectors client

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.proxy-port
properties.description: To define a proxy port when instantiating the S3 Vectors client

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.proxy-protocol
properties.description: To define a proxy protocol when instantiating the S3 Vectors client

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.region
properties.description: The region in which S3 Vectors client needs to work. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the lowercase name of the region (for example ap-east-1)

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.s3-vectors-client
properties.description: Reference to a software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3vectors.S3VectorsClient in the registry. The option is a software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3vectors.S3VectorsClient type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.secret-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Secret Key

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.session-token
properties.description: Amazon AWS Session Token used when the user needs to assume an IAM role

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.similarity-threshold
properties.description: The minimum similarity threshold for results

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.top-k
properties.description: The number of top similar vectors to return in a query

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.trust-all-certificates
properties.description: If we want to trust all certificates in case of overriding the endpoint

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.uri-endpoint-override
properties.description: Set the overriding uri endpoint. This option needs to be used in combination with overrideEndpoint option

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.use-default-credentials-provider
properties.description: Set whether the S3 Vectors client should expect to load credentials through a default credentials provider.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.use-profile-credentials-provider
properties.description: Set whether the S3 Vectors client should expect to load credentials through a profile credentials provider.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.use-session-credentials
properties.description: Set whether the S3 Vectors client should expect to use Session Credentials. This is useful in a situation in which the user needs to assume an IAM role for doing operations in S3 Vectors.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.vector-dimensions
properties.description: The dimensions of the vector embeddings (default: 1536, which is the dimension for OpenAI text-embedding-3-small)

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-s3-vectors.vector-index-name
properties.description: The name of the vector index
